subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Jan Ullrich was denied entry in the Tour de France, a race he won in 1997, after his name surfaced in a Spanish doping investigation.
snippet: Jan Ullrich was denied entry in the Tour de France, a race he won in 1997, after his name surfaced in a Spanish doping investigation.
